ajito_honoo_010_sitappa_01:
Whoa, whoa, you can’t be here. This base
belongs to Team Star.[VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_honoo_010_sitappa_02:
If you don’t clear out real quick-like, I’ll hafta
come at you in self-defense. You get me?[VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_honoo_010_sitappa_03: Right answer, kid. Hasta la vistaaar! ☆[VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_honoo_010_sitappa_04:
Well, all right! Time for me to self-defense the
snot right outta ya![VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_honoo_010_sitappa_06:
Wait... Are you that kid who declared war on
Team Star?[VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_honoo_010_sitappa_07:
Whoa, thanks for the terrible news!\c
’Scuse me while I book it back to the rest of
my crew![VAR 0114(002F)]
ajito_honoo_010_nelke_02:
Cassiopeia told me to scope out the Fire
crew’s base.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_honoo_010_nelke_03:
I thought I’d come give you some backup now
that I’m through, but seems you’re all set.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_honoo_010_nelke_06: I thought so! What are you doing here?[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_honoo_010_select_06: Do you know this li’l fella?
ajito_honoo_010_nelke_08:
He’s one of the Pokémon the academy takes
care of within its grounds.[VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_honoo_010_nelke_11:
It looks like he may have some connection to
Team Star’s Fire crew...\c
I’d better chase after him. Don’t worry—I’ll
regroup with you soon enough![VAR 0114(001E)]
ajito_honoo_010_nelke_12:
[VAR BD06(0000)]You press ahead into the base,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(001E)]
